!ENTRY org.eclipse.core.resources 4 368 Jan 27, 2004 18:44:55.946
!MESSAGE Resource /Users does not exist.


This bug began occuring since i accidentally launched eclipse twice, and has not been resolved by 
a full reinstall / rebuild of the worksapce. 

Error does not occur on initial project creation, but occurs when trying to make any chnage to 
project environenmnt (such as adding to build path

please help, this is preventing me from doing further development :(

This has been fixed for 3.0.

The build path must contain a library that is not there anymore (in the /Users
directory). Fix this entry to get rid of the error.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 39720 ***
